summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated Sunday, August 4, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, leave statuses (sick, annual, military), and overtime occurrences for the facility. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of prison staffing on a date shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and during his incarceration at MCC.

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Listed as an officer on the roster, assigned to a post with overtime (OT) and comptime (CT) notations.

persons.name: CAR
persons.context: Appears as an identifier ('Changed By') for a status update entry on September 22.

events.title: MCC Daily Staff Roster
events.description: Standard daily assignment and shift roster for correctional staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: MCC New York New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for Sunday, August 4, 2019.
It shows detailed shift schedules, post assignments (e.g., CONTROL, SHU, INTERNAL, ATTY CONE), and staff leave statuses (Sick, Annual, Military, AWOL).
The roster indicates 113 correctional services staff and 9 non-correctional services staff were scheduled, with 22 overtime occurrences recorded.
The document includes administrative change records with timestamps and staff initials (RW, SJ, JD, DM, KS) documenting shift relief and status updates.
The date of the roster (August 4, 2019) places it during the period when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at MCC prior to his death.
